metadata.title: CVE-2023-7216 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A path traversal vulnerability was found in the CPIO utility. This issuecould allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to trick a user into openinga specially crafted archive. During the extraction process, the archivercould follow symlinks outside of the intended directory, which allows filesto be written in arbitrary directories through symlinks.

criterions.comment: cpio package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
